divs: Sighting DetailsHusband saw object in our direction of the building. His coworkers friend also saw it in Riverview. Could be a UFO, or military craft but the object was silent, and stationary for five minutes as if observing people below. There was a bright white spotlight projecting out of it. We watched it until it left about three minutes later it followed our direction, and then turned to the right moving slowly just above the condo buildings. It was dark outside at this time but I could makeout a boomerang, or a triangle shape craft. I have a picture but it didn't seem to come out real well to dark outside.
trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There was one other sighting in Tampa on or around February 25th 2010
Summary: Had A Big White Spotlight on it
